title: Carlos Joins the Team
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 195 words, Level G (Grade 1), Lexile 450L, Fiction Series
description: Carlos is asked to join the baseball team. He is excited to make new friends because he is new at school. Becky invites Carlos to her birthday party; however, he has an important baseball game that day. Carlos has a decision to make. Where will he go? Students have the opportunity to visualize and to identify the problem and solution. Detailed, supportive illustrations support readers.
reviewWords: baseball, catch, join, miss, team, watch
comprehension: Problem and Solution                : Identify problem and solution
awareness: Short Vowels                : Discriminate short /i/ vowel sound
